Transcription for 1013766

Black and white, white and stickers on my hair...
A newsorry flower meeting before the door the full moon
Velvet WHOH
The herald angels sing,
Glory to the newborn King.
He has come down from the dark,
And in the evening rain he comes,
And in the evening rain he comes,
Our glorious evening feast.
Glory to the newborn King,
When the hills are all clear,
Our glorious evening feast.
Glory to the infant King,
Glory to the newborn King,
Glory to the infant King,
Glory!
